text: Samuel Archibald Anthony "Sam" Hinds (born 27 December 1943) is a Guyanan politician."Sam Hinds", NNDB. He was several times Prime Minister of Guyana. Last time from 1999 to 2015. He was also briefly President of Guyana, in 1997. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Guyana Category:Prime Ministers of Guyana Category:Socialist politicians
title: Sam Hinds
